name: MAKE BETTER USE
bulletPoients: Implemented CRUD operations to handle adding and deleteing users and products
Admin has the ability to delete seller, buyer, and reported products and verify sellers.
Users can report a product and the product will be shown on the admin's dashboard.then admin can delete the product.
Implemented payment gateway so that user can pay using card.
Implemented JWT verifications to secure the APIs and admin and seller roles.
Implemented different routes for users, sellers and admin so that the system maintenance get easier.
Implemented the advertisement functionality so that sellers can advertise their products. Advertised products will be shown in the home page.
Implemented features like updating/deleting reviews, Sign up, Sign in, Google Sign in, and Sign Out. Authentication was handled using Firebase.

name: FLYTOGRAPHER
bulletPoients: Implemented CRUD operations to handle adding and deleteing service and reviews.
Implemented privet route so that users can not visit that route before sign in to the website.
Implemented JWT token verification for securing the users reviews.
Users can Sign up, Sign in, Sign in with google, and Sign Out. User authentication was handled using Firebase.
Implemented conditional rendering in different places.

name: LEARN PHYSICS
bulletPoients: Implemented firebase authentication for user authentication.
Usrs can download course details pdf.
By clicking course cards user will be redirected to the course details page.
Users can Sign in and Sign up using email and password, and Sign out. Users can also Sign in with google and GitHub.
Responsive and well-designed for both mobile and desktop.
Implemented a private route so that users can not visit the checkout route before Sign-in.
